document.full_text: facing an illinois legislature hostile to his proposals, former illinois governor rod blagojevich salivated over the benefits he could win for making an appointment to the senate, according to testimony in his corruption trial tuesday.
document.title: blagojevich talks on tape about trading senate seat
lines_and_colors: facing an illinois legislature hostile to his proposals, former illinois governor rod blagojevich salivated over the benefits he could win for making an appointment to the senate, according to testimony in his corruption trial tuesday.
